ActCanada Transportation Act
PrecisApproval for the Minister of Transport, Infrastructure and Communities to enter into a CONTRIBUTION AGREEMENT with the Hudson Bay Railway Company, for a total amount not to exceed $20 million payable for the fiscal years 2008-2009 to 2017-2018.
